click_to_upload: <1>Click to upload</1> or drag and drop

resume.description: Everything you need to create, optimize, and perfect your resume and cover letters all in one place. Choose a tool below to get started on your job application journey.

cards.cover_letter_desc: Use your resume to instantly craft a tailored cover letter for any job.
cards.resume_builder_desc: Create a professional resume based on your skills and experience
cards.ats_scanner_desc: Check how well your resume performs with Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS).

cover_letter_generator.header: Build Your Cover Letter with Ease
cover_letter_generator.description: Upload your resume or select an existing one to generate a personalized cover letter you can review, customize, and export in just a few clicks.
cover_letter_generator.placeholder: Your generated cover letter will appear here. You can edit, copy, or export it as needed.

ats_scanner.description: Analyze your resume and optimize it for Applicant Tracking Systems
ats_scanner.recruiter_note: Your resume tells recruiters you're a {{score}}% match for this job
ats_scanner.job_desc_info: Adding a job description will enable Job Match Score analysis

cards.job_match_score_desc: Measures how closely your resume aligns with the job description — based on role titles, required skills, and relevant keywords.
cards.skill_accuracy_desc: Assesses whether your resume accurately lists key skills and tools related to your field.
cards.skill_application_desc: Evaluates how well the you demonstrates your skills in action — through achievements, quantified results, and context.
cards.ats_readability_desc: Analyzes whether the resume's format and structure are machine-readable.

applications.description: Stay organized throughout your job search. Add your applications, update their status as you progress, and keep all your opportunities in one easy-to-manage place.
applications.empty_state_desc: It looks like you haven't added any applications yet. Click the button below to log your first job and begin tracking its progress.

form.title: Add New Application
form.description: Add all the details of your latest job application to stay organized and move closer to your next role.
form.notes_placeholder: Add any additional notes about this application...

interview_prep.desc: Develop real-world confidence through interactive challenges designed to elevate your performance in any interview.

mode.title: Choose your interview mode
mode.desc: Pick the style that fits your preparation goal

practice.title: Practice
practice.subtitle: Learn at your own pace
practice.desc: Unlimited time to think. Get instant feedback with detailed explanations after each answer. Perfect for building confidence.

challenge.title: Challenge
challenge.subtitle: Race against the clock
challenge.desc: Time-based questions to simulate real interview pressure. Review all answers and explanations at the end of the challenge.

survival.title: Survival
survival.subtitle: Every answer count
survival.desc: Start with 3 lives. Each wrong answer costs a life and shows you the correct answer. How long can you survive?

role.placeholder: e.g., Frontend Developer, Virtual Assistant, Data Scientist..
role.title: What role are you interviewing for?
role.desc: Tell us the position you're preparing for

level.title: Select your experience level
level.desc: Choose the level that matches your experience

skills.title: Select skills to focus on
skills.desc: Select the skills you'd like to strengthen before your interview. You can search for your own or start with the most common ones below
skills.max_reached: You have reached the maximum of {{max}} skills. Remove one to add another.
skills.start_typing: Start typing or select skills below to define your focus area.
skills.placeholder: Search skills or type to add custom skill...
skills.unavailable: All popular skills have been selected or are unavailable.
skills.no_suggestions: No suggestions matching "{{searchVal}". Use 'Add Custom' above to proceed.

practice.title: Practice Mode
practice.desc: Learn at your own pace with full flexibility
practice.no_limit: No time limit - take as long as you need
practice.view_answers: View correct answers and explanations after completion

challenge.title: Challenge Mode
challenge.desc: Race against time to test your speed and accuracy
challenge.timer: 30 minutes total time limit for all questions
challenge.cannot_return: Cannot return to previous questions once you move forward
challenge.can_change: Can change your answer before moving to next question
challenge.quiz_ends: Quiz ends when time runs out or all questions completed

survival.title: Survival Mode
survival.lives: Start with 3 lives - lose one for each wrong answer
survival.final_answer: Answer is final once selected - no changes allowed
survival.correct_answer: See correct answer immediately after selection
survival.game_ends: Game ends if you run out of lives
